Reviews.Content: This phone is NOT worth 179.00 its fake and its absolutely a lie and I wouldn't tell anyone to buy it

Reviews.Content: awful phone .dont waste your time. it is a genric phone that I would give 1 out of 10 .if that

Reviews.Content: device is great works well and doing well, i love it and will be buying a new one...thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Thanks Henson world
Reviews.Author: Currick Dandridge
Reviews.Content: Henson world was very good they really makes effort to satisfy their costumers in every way possible thanks for making things easy

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: angel williams
Reviews.Content: the phone looks great and like its in great condition as stated. looks like it works properly, like it has great features.

Reviews.Title: This Phone
Reviews.Author: Sha'Kerra
Reviews.Content: I find this phone would be helpful to someone who is not into the modern technology wirld. Although it was not what I wanted at all, it was very conveinant for the time I had it. The seller was very cooperative!

Reviews.Title: It to small and to hard to swich around
Reviews.Author: Tabitha Birkle
Reviews.Content: I didn't really like it cause it was hard to change to different things. And wasn't really what I wanted

Reviews.Title: HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: K Davidson
Reviews.Content: This phone didn't meet my expectations. It wouldn't download anything or connect to wifi. I couldn't understand anything being that it was in a whole different language and there was no directions or anything that came with it. I wouldn't recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Grateful for having this phone.
Reviews.Author: marie cooper
Reviews.Content: I like touch tone phones. They are less headache very mordenized. They make you do things like you are using a computer.

Reviews.Title: cell ph
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Norwood
Reviews.Content: not good wants to send it back,because my bluetooth dont work with it because i like to be hand free

DualSIMdual standby:supports 2 SIM 2 standby simultaneously
